website_summaries.verdict: This set of 12 ties comes at a bargain price, fully stocking any man’s closet without breaking the bank.
pros: Expansive set in an array of different colors means that any man will be ready to be stylish no matter where life takes him
Ties are nicely made and can withstand many wears and retain quality
cons: These ties are shorter than others on the market

customer_reviews.title: FAKE SILK TIES..DISHONEST SELLER RIPPING PEOPLE"S MONEY... DO NOT BUY FROM  WEISHANG....CHEAP POLYESTER not 100% SIlk
customer_reviews.text: FAKE SILK TIES. These ties are made from polyester. I burned one of them to see if the material turned into ashes. Since the material is polyester the material burns and curls up. It's a disappointment that this seller is dishonest by saying his ties are 100%. BUYERS BE AWARE OF THIS DISHONEST SELLER. CHEAP MATERIALS !!! HE SHOULD BE BANNED AS A SELLER.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M.

customer_reviews.title: Short Ties
customer_reviews.text: The ties are good quality and I like the colors, but they are 5-6 inches shorter than every other tie I own. I am not a tall man 5'6". The ties are too short.
customer_reviews.author: Grady

customer_reviews.title: ... surprised when they arrived to notice they are surprisingly nicely made. Not a luxury tie by any means ...
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the quality about these when I purchased them but was pleasantly surprised when they arrived to notice they are surprisingly nicely made. Not a luxury tie by any means but look professional and nobody at the office would know you went cheap and spent $3.33 per tie.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey P

customer_reviews.title: Great ties
customer_reviews.text: These ties are surprisingly good. I took a gamble but figured the price would justify any result. I am very pleased. I've gotten many complements and people are surprised. Did not pay $75 or more. They arrived quickly and in great condition. I plan to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Ohlookapuppy

customer_reviews.title: These ties are NOT 100% silk. They are microfiber ...
customer_reviews.text: These ties are NOT 100% silk. They are microfiber ties being advertised as silk. They even went as far to include 100% silk on the small tag of the tie.
customer_reviews.author: B N

customer_reviews.title: A Worthwhile Investment
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear banded collar shirts when I dress up for church. I decided to go the conventional route and purchase some ties. This set was a real bargain. The ties were sharp and inexpensive. I would purchase another set with different design at a later date. It is a worthwhile investment. Item arrived on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mapkinbe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality ties for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY pleased with these ties! The colors are bright and vibrant and the packaging was a nice touch. It came in a thick plastic-like ziplock storage bag. Each tie was individually wrapped in it's own wrapping. It was easy for me to arrange inside of a gift box. The length of the ties are perfect for my husband and I can't wait for him to see the variation of colors. I am very happy today!
customer_reviews.author: missparker

customer_reviews.title: Nice ties at an amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice ties at an amazing price. My only complaint is that they come with hard creases in them that don't go away by hanging. $20 buys an awesome steamer from Amazon, so problem solved. I bought my son a tie for his bar mitzvah at a men's shop and paid $75 for one tie. These are of equal quality for a fraction of the price. I wear ties daily at work so these will get well used. And let's be honest...they're ties...they don't get subjected to a lot of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: FRI-Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers have said they aren't silk. I haven't tried to singe one to find out because I'm very pleased with them. A wide variety of conservative colors and patterns, at less than $4 each. I needed these for a professional wardrobe as I transition out of the military, and it fits the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Olsen

customer_reviews.title: super nice family with super nice customer service - they ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my mom was looking for some simple yet eye catching gifts for family members. Words can't explain how thrilled she was when they came in! We were on a bit of a time crunch, but they came in on the day estimated so no problems there. None of the ties are the same design and it's such an affordable yet cute thing to gift to others. Also, super nice family with super nice customer service - they sent me an email after I received the ties and it was just to check in and see if I liked them :) I really appreciated that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not silk
customer_reviews.text: Not silk, even though they're nice ties. Can't beat the deal for this package at the price, but they lose 2.5 stars for lying about the material and half a star for the fact that a few of the designs are hideous. Still worth the price in my opinion, even if you'll only wear 4 or 5 of the ties
customer_reviews.author: Don'tMessWithTheZ

customer_reviews.title: The patters are a little more visible than i expected,
customer_reviews.text: The patters are a little more visible than i expected, as I thought these would be mostly solid colored ties but they definitely werent. Also, the two grey's are nearly identical in color. for the price (about $3 per tie) I can't complain much. I usually spend $20 per tie for my husband. He'll be happy on Chrstmas to have all of these
customer_reviews.author: L. Boots

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING VALUE
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING value. I received 12 miscellaneous colored high quality ties for less than the price of one at men’s warehouse. The colors are vibrant yet classy, not overbearing or loud. The only suggestion I would make would be that the couple of black/red and black/blue are a bit similar and maybe a variety could expand the versatility slightly. AN UNBELIEVABLE BARGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: michael gallagher

customer_reviews.title: High quality Low Price!
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie...you wont find ties in better colors or quality then these for the price! I need a bunch of ties quick for my husband that would last his wear and tear everyday kind of job and these are the best! Purchased a second set for my sons for church! Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Ties, Packaging Lacking
customer_reviews.text: Great ties, only giving 4 stars because the packaging makes them arrive a little wrinkled. Cellophane and rubber bands -- but I knew that when I purchased them. The ties themselves are great, and I'll probably buy more from them.
customer_reviews.author: Frog

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of these I've purchased for my husband and he loves them. He only wears a tie once a week and enjoys having a wide variety to select from, and they don't break the bank. Very satisfied and will purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda in TX

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one
customer_reviews.text: Way too thin and not wide enough. I'm not sure what I was expecting for the price I guess I was hoping for too much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wear ties every day and often spill something on ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear ties every day and often spill something on my ties. I was looking for some decent ties that I might get a few wears out of and then toss. These fit the bill. Passable. Not quite as substantial as an expensive ties, but it hurts less when you throw these away.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Dennis Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: 11 out of 12 not bad, they look nice the red one was sewed wrong had the tie catch on the front of the tie, I tried removing it but it shows a visible crease where it was plus nothing to catch back of tie now unless I tack it
customer_reviews.author: Edgar VanTassel jr.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible purchase. I throw them all away except the Red and Black stripes
customer_reviews.author: MEHRAN MOTAMEDI

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack as a gift and I was afraid that the receiver would not like them. Style, feeling, etc. But they loved the ties. They were pleased with gift and I would definitely buy them again in a different style as another gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was very bad packing and all were with wrinkles as shown in attached photos, low quality = cheap
customer_reviews.author: Sharif Kareem

customer_reviews.title: Men’s store quality
customer_reviews.text: Needed a red tie while in Philadelphia so I stopped at Men’s Warehouse. They wanted 59$ for one tie. Decided to pass then ordered these ties. Got a dozen for less $ than one at men’s warehouse, and zero difference in quality. No brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Lefemine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Ties
customer_reviews.text: Really good looking and great quality all silk ties. What a great price, just compare with ties you can by at large department stores for $45 or more. Great selection of colors, all for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sirrocker

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful ties at bargin price
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived today, weeks ahead of schedule! I have been wearing ties every day to work for decades, so I know ties. These are excellent, quality ties. First time I ever bought ties in bulk, so I wasn't sure what to expect. I am not disappointed. For the guys that say they are narrower than expected, listen up, the 1990's are over. Wide ties had their day when wide suit lapels were in style. I hope you are are still not wearing those, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rpm

customer_reviews.title: A nice selection of decent quality tie colors
customer_reviews.text: I got the wrong style the first time and they were HIDEOUS. When I finally got the solids with minor patterns I was very impressed. A nice selection of decent quality tie colors. Makes it easier to match with the wife when going out for cocktails. I don't believe for a moment they are silk though.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: These are not skinny...
customer_reviews.text: Wear suit and tie everyday. I am a blend in type of guy. Don't need anything flashy but don't want anything sticking out either (no skinny ties)... these are perfect. Cheap, monetarily, but they look good. Received some compliments. And there is good variety. Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: RobbyW

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: So many ties. Lots of patterns and colors that my husband doesn't know which to wear. I ended up giving one of the ties to my son as well. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great selection of ties in a similar style! When you wear ties daily, and need a new look every day, this is an economical solution. Pleasantly surprised at the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dieselator

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Value, Nice Ties.
customer_reviews.text: The assort can go with a lot of different shirts and the quality is really good for the low price. The colors are bright and solid and the material is not flimsy.I highly recommend if you are trying to increase your wardrobe on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Danny P

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: These are not 100% silk. I bought them to dye Easter eggs which require 100% silk. I should have known the price was to good for that many "silk" ties. The small tag says 100% silk which is not true.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Colors are not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good deal ...ties are of decent quality and good for every day use. The big concern is that the image used to market the item leads you to believe there will be a wide variety of colors. Nearly half of the ties i received are extremely dark colors (black, dark burgundy, etc.) I was expecting more of a variety ..... there are no blue ties, no purple ties, etc. These ties will be decent for winter months or funerals, but not much use for summer/spring time.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: If these are silk ties then I am Robert Redford. These are awful cheap looking polyester. The patterns are so bright that only clowns in a circus should wear them. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: kmd

customer_reviews.title: UGLY- BAD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: These ties would not be worn by my grandpa, these are definitely wide so if you're in your younger years these are not a match for you. They claim to be silk but feel like they are some sort of cheap material and no labels indicating what their made of. The pictues of them look semi decent but in person they look HIDEOUS
customer_reviews.author: RAY M

customer_reviews.title: They’re a nice width (not too skinny or too wide)
customer_reviews.text: Lots of ties for the price! They’re a nice width (not too skinny or too wide), and good length for tying a double Windsor. They all have similar pattern, and come in 12 different colors. The only con I can think of is there are 3 pink ties (different shades); one pink tie is enough, IMHO. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: ZekeDoom

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Right Size
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived as noted and undamaged. Ties packed in individual plastic covers then packaged together. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The ties look great. They feel very solid and well made. I wear a tie everyday for work, but I don't want to pay top dollar if something comparable for much cheaper. This is that product. The patterns and designs are very stylish. The ties look as good as the more expensive ones that I have. I constantly get compliments on my neckwear.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Resh

customer_reviews.title: I have the best ties in the office.
customer_reviews.text: Stunning quilty and very pleased with the item. Really glad to purchase this. Well packaged and arrived very quickly. I highly recommend the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: monkey

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Ties are not silk but still nice looking. You can spend $30 for a single tie and get tired of it or you can spend $35 for twelve ties and have lots to pick from. Seems like a no brainer to me.
customer_reviews.author: Momto4

customer_reviews.title: This is Not the finest silk but exactly what I want because they last ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is as expected for the price, pattern and color combinations are as advertised. This is Not the finest silk but exactly what I want because they last longer. I give it a neautral 3 stars because these are very short ties if you're 5'10 or taller. Forget the windsor knot if you want even a 2 inch tail. The packaging wrinkles are easily steamed out.
customer_reviews.author: Bidcode

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these ties for my son as a gift. Great for everyday use! Good deal! Bought the Paisley ties. They were good material and quality. Just need to steam the wrinkles out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Ties colors are great and vibrant! (ties are a little shorter than normal though)
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Love the collection of ties and the colors are great Cons: Ties are a little short for my liking, they make it hard to do any fancy knots with them.
customer_reviews.author: michael thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ties for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This set is excellent for a starting business attire closet. I started a job that I needed to wear a tie and this was perfect. Good quality ties for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Friedrich

customer_reviews.title: What you see is NOT what you get!
customer_reviews.text: The ties that were advertised were vibrant in color and appeasing to the eyes. However, upon receipt they were no where near the beauty as was advertised. The quality and beauty was not there!
customer_reviews.author: Smacky

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars given how inexpensive the ties are
customer_reviews.text: I threw away about half of them as too ugly to wear or too repetitive with another tie in the collection. The quality is better than I expected for the price. Given the low price the remaining 6 were still a bargain the collection gave me a choice on which ones I prefer to keep. Overall, this is a good one time purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Neospinoza

customer_reviews.title: Great ties
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and was little skeptical. I received these ties and I'm happy. The material is good, and the ties are nice, and length. People expect great quality for the price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Not silk but quite nice
customer_reviews.text: I saw in the reviews that people had found these are not 100% silk, and they certainly aren’t, but I bought them anyway. They’re great and I’m glad I did. Nice quality and sharp looking.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Still not a bad deal; gave most away
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. The ties are too skinny for my tasted. Was expecting thicker ones that make the knot look big but these were not it. Still not a bad deal; gave most away.
customer_reviews.author: AVF

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear suits everyday for work. You can’t beat the price/quality of these ties. They look as good as ties you pay$50 each in a dept store.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Buy Better Ties With Your Money
customer_reviews.text: You pay for what you get. They're not nearly as vibrant as they look in the pics. Very low quality and thin. I didn't even receive what was pictured. I bought this particular grouping due to the nice, bright red ties (2 of them). Upon receiving them, one of the red ones was substituted for a crappy black tie with small accents. And the red I did receive is more of a burgundy with almost no 'pop' to it.
customer_reviews.author: audiom3

customer_reviews.title: great ties that feel expensive but they're affordable
customer_reviews.text: great ties - i was worried about not having any ties and now i have too many. i love america (even though these ties are shipped from china)
customer_reviews.author: kimcd9

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design, Good Quality, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sons who attend private school and the ties were surprisingly of quite good quality (for the price) and nicely designed. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: T Michael Black Jr

customer_reviews.title: It is like a cheap plastic looking material
customer_reviews.text: This was a rip off. The product is not silk. It is like a cheap plastic looking material. Looks like a clown costume piece.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: These ties are a great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pastor. These ties are a great deal for the price. People keep asking me where I got them. Will order a different pattern when needed. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: That one Guy

customer_reviews.title: Eeeh...
customer_reviews.text: These ties have nice color... and the styles are very basic, classic, but they have a bit of a cheap feel to them. They're a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: T1969

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: Good Product. Good start for a first time tie collection.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised by the quality! These are easily as good as ties I've paid $40 each for. Got exactly what was pictured. Colors and patterns were exactly as expected. Awesome value. Will be buying the other collections.
customer_reviews.author: Mike West

customer_reviews.title: Quality ties
customer_reviews.text: As advertised Only issue is they will have to be ironed due to the way they are packaged to get out wrinkles before first used
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4th set
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 4 sets of similar ties but this set is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Casual Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Choose your tie!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by the look of them. My husband loved them, because there was such a variety of colors. I wasn't too crazy about them being folded in half as there's a crease on them, but we lay them flat for a few days. I hope the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Gar

customer_reviews.title: and the quality is awesome, and he LOVES them
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical of how the quality was going to turn out since they are made in China, but I got these for my husband, and the quality is awesome, and he LOVES them. Ordered more after for my dad, and he also said they are great quality, and he loves them, cant beat for the price also!
customer_reviews.author: Cjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my fiancé as a part of his birthday gift and he was extremely happy! There’s a color for any outfit he wears! I’ve ordered from here before and I’m never disappointed- very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Feliciah

customer_reviews.title: Coloris dim
customer_reviews.text: Obviously the coloring of the ties disappointed me. They are different than the pictures showing bright and light colors. Actual products are kind of grey-ish, and darker. Other than that pretty good ties.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good set of first timer ties
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. Bought them for my son. Good set of first timer ties. Can’t get that dimple under the knot that you can with higher quality ties but what do expect for the price. They are what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great collection of ties beautiful assortment of colors great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great collection of ties beautiful assortment of colors great value and quality
customer_reviews.author: nancy a carroll

customer_reviews.title: Nice ties
customer_reviews.text: A great assortment of smart ties. Perfect as a gift
customer_reviews.author: DAVID BERNSTEIN

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these ties on the weekend and they were here early Tuesday morning. They are a dozen of the most vivid and colorful ties I have ever seen. I'm going to wear one to church on Sunday and see what kind of comments I get. And 12 ties only cost $38.99. That's $3.25 per tie. Talk about thrifty!
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! The only thing I did not like was the set came with two of the same color.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney J.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality ties at a great value price!!
customer_reviews.text: The ties were better than expected. They are great quality, came packaged in an excellent fashion. I don't understand the few negative reviews. If your expected a $100 a piece tie, why are you shopping on Amazon. The value for these ties are outstanding. It's a great value buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D. Aurience

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and look amazing. Don't bother going to a store to pay $20 per tie. Each tie was individually wrapped to make sure they didn't crease while shipping. I'll definitely be ordering more of these.
customer_reviews.author: D-man

customer_reviews.title: ... half of the ties I would wear not exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: About half of the ties I would wear not exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Decorah Dude.

customer_reviews.title: Great ties!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my husband. Wasn't sure that these would be high enough quality for him to wear to his corporate job every day. But, these are great ties and very nicely made. They have held up.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Have received many compliments.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive ties. I have never gotten so many compliments on a tie than i have from these. Particularly the pink one. Quality is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these ties, only complaints are that they aren’t silk and the pictures are a tad misleading. But with this many ties, the price, and the patterns still exceptional, it’s a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mickeal Friend

customer_reviews.title: I love the product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ties. Arriving right on time to offer my Love
customer_reviews.author: Albertina Madalena Cossa

customer_reviews.title: value play
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the colors, most were a gift, took a few myself. Bit short and don't feel like silk. For the bulk purchase I am content.
customer_reviews.author: Rutger Thieme

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at the quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Yes, there are better quality ties out there, but not by much. The material isn't flimsy and the stitching doesn't fall apart, which I have seen happen n some cheap ties.
customer_reviews.author: Barcelo

customer_reviews.title: I recommend them to all who wish to get ties at ...
customer_reviews.text: These ties give me the variety of color and style I am looking for. I recommend them to all who wish to get ties at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new ties they look great and many colors to choose from!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice! I was worried after I order them that ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice! I was worried after I order them that they would not be, however these are really nice. I would order this brand again
customer_reviews.author: bev

customer_reviews.title: WRINKLED
customer_reviews.text: ties were in individual cellophane sleeves then rubber-banded together and mailed in a soft plastic envelope. BIG DISAPPOINTMENT with the wrinkles that need to be removed. Ties should have been rolled, not folded for shipping. Get your iron, distilled water and protective cloth out! HATE IRONING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kent B

customer_reviews.title: Great ties, amazing for the price but...
customer_reviews.text: They sent me a duplicate tie so I missed out on one of the patterns. Otherwise they're great and comparable to ties that cost $25 a piece at a department store
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: No problems with the ties as far as I know ...
customer_reviews.text: No problems with the ties as far as I know bought it for my husband he loves them. Okay quality and a variety of colors makes it easier for him to match with his colorful shirts
customer_reviews.author: Aquilla parker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ties, but thinner than traditional ties so they ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ties, but thinner than traditional ties so they look odd when I wear them - I'm a bigger guy (6'1", 220 pounds) so it's not like thin ties look good on me.
customer_reviews.author: eric j otfinoski

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment of ties for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of ties for a great price! Packaging was more than I expected it would be. Each tie is in a cellophane sleeve and all the ties came inside one, soft plastic zip-lock type pouch. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: kamoanui

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of ties and good quality. My only wish was that you could mix and match the design instead of getting the same design in varying colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't as good of material as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't as good of material as I thought, most of the neckties thread started to unravel after a few times I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, good quality and you will stand out
customer_reviews.text: Looks good,good quality and you will stand out.Need multi colored shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The ties are awesome but the pack that I bough was not the ...
customer_reviews.text: The ties are awesome but the pack that I bough was not the pack I received. Totally different colors and style.
customer_reviews.author: Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Great Colors But Wish If They Were Already Tied Up and Ready to Use!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and excellent for casual wear; I wish though they are ready to put on - I hate to wrap my ties.
customer_reviews.author: EJD

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of patterns. They feel "cheaper" to the touch but you can't tell by looking at them. (At least I can't).
customer_reviews.author: Spencer King

customer_reviews.title: TRUST ME it is money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Great price, good ties what else would you want? A singing review. 😄
customer_reviews.author: kendall thom

customer_reviews.title: ties were not a silk quality
customer_reviews.text: The pictures of the ties looked like what I was looking for But when seeing in person not the rich colors I was expecting Looked more like wash out cotton material Able to return same day and received credit quickly Dont waste your time
customer_reviews.author: W T B

customer_reviews.title: Tie heaven
customer_reviews.text: Ties recieved and are exactly as pictured. Actually to get 12 ties for $38 I was concerned about their quality since In the recent past I paid more than that for 1 tie. Although these are not the same quality as that 1 tie they look great and I look forward to wearing them. I definitely recommend them and believe they deserve 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bpersuaded

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Tend to fray a little over time but lots of variety
customer_reviews.author: DTW

customer_reviews.title: None at the moment
customer_reviews.text: I like the ties it was a Christmas gift for my boss
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Carter

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great color choice and good quality product for the price.... I'm satisfied as my hubby loved the collection!
customer_reviews.author: Nimra

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the ties are pretty nice!! I’m very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave them as a Christmas gift! They came in a zip bag individually wrapped. Great colors and patterns. The gift was a hit!!
customer_reviews.author: kpowell

customer_reviews.title: Great ties at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality and I had the ties in just a couple days. I'll be buying more. Only wish there was a way to put together a custom package.
customer_reviews.author: John Willimon

product_meta.title: Weishang Lot 12 PCS Classic Men's Tie Silk Necktie Woven JACQUARD Neck Ties
product_meta.description:
High-quality with excellent interlining. Heavily weighted and elastic and hence can easily make a knot. These jacquard woven ties are all in gloriously voluminous manner and will fully satisfy your expectation in working place, party and formal place
